documents.document: @StepanianGaiane a parent, most certainly.
@sini333 anything if I can sleep for 4 hours straight.
@samicsans my tired brain.
When do I get to trade lives with Rosie?
@ContactSH @lovelyddc Really, Sherlock? 'LOL'.
@lovelyddc then, apparently, we are "twinsies".
@spookyleftist love them!
@MedusasAngel @ContactSH @LadySlytherin13 and it wouldn't be the first time...
31st of March, everyone. I will be waiting.
@ContactSH Oh. Damn. Well, there's so much cake in my notifications right now, I can't imagine what my birthday will look like.
@LadySlytherin13 @ContactSH don't tempt the poor man. He's struggling, anyway.
@ContactSH ME? Did you read yours before? I just provided context (which lacked, judging by the comments).
@Ispany_RM @ContactSH neither of us is on diet.
@superlock666 you can leave the salt out, if you'll be using tears.
@vivodiodair @ContactSH More interesting than Dante? I doubt it.
@ContactSH true. But only because you went to ridiculous lengths to order the one I mentioned.
@pyjamays good & restless.
@leslyeknope she won't stop.
@CharCubed the best one: chocolate.
@odacactusx please. She's far better.
@artandpotions everyone can. She actually did.
You all seem excited that I am back at Baker Street. But Mrs. Hudson actually made me a cake. Bless her.
@badwolfdr we're on round 3.
@vivodiodair almost dying changes your perspective. I'd say yes, we're fine.
@CorruptedMint kidnapped by Moriarty fanatic. Found & rescued by Sherlock. Back home.
@ContactSH @atreyeerc I'm still teaching her "No shit, Sherlock." Just so you know.
@ContactSH @atreyeerc you have been spending way too much time together.
@Ispany_RM @ContactSH ...probably. Yes.
@thescientist291 @ContactSH @rivahwho of course not. This was no one's fault.
@etherealfrmn I appreciate your concern. All is well when it ends well.
@ContactSH good to see you're fit enough to mock my writing. Again.
@ContactSH Rosie. How can you not hear her?
@sweeransoul this is Twitter. I will thank him personally. Again & again.
@ContactSH I know that. Thank you, Sherlock.
@Tori626 he's alright. Resting now.
@AMHymyilee Mrs. Hudson has been taking care of her. I was relieved kiss her forehead just now.
@Tori626 in a cast now. But it could've been worse. I'll get it out in 3 weeks.
So... sorry for the silence. This is John. The murderer has been caught and thrown in prison. Sherlock and I are both ok&safely back home.
@ContactSH endearing. I'll keep him busy until you arrive.
@ContactSH that's more than one word. Come get the happy ending to your story.
@ContactSH you have one word.
@ContactSH booring! I'll see you later! P.S. You should put a cast on that poor doctor's arm.
@ContactSH now beg. Come on. Just for me.
@ContactSH don't forget to say goodbyeee
I can see why you all like him so much. The sounds he makes... a thing of beauty.
@ContactSH well, now you spoiled my fun. I might break a little bone.

https://t.co/pDigsNzmc6
Just to have it as background music, y'all.
I should get a Twitter. This is soooooo much fun.
@ContactSH Johnny boy, here? Ups, you should've said something earlier.
Tictoctictoc.
@ContactSH you can be so dramatic.
@ContactSH stupidstupidSTUUUUPID. You're sooo slow. Did sentiment change you that much?
@etherealfrmn oh. How sweet. He's a bit late, though.
Looks like people are not so sentimental about their pets, after all.
@ContactSH such a shame. Not that smart, after all.
It seems I wasn't clear. John will not be replying your cries of attention. He's busy.
Sorry everyone. The Doctor will see you later. Maybe.
The signal's awful. Clearly not Baker Street.
.. yet I am somewhere. Is this a real kidnap?
Avoid cabs at all costs. They are all ruled by Big Brother.
Ok. Taking your brother is one thing - but this IS kidnapping.
It was 'idiot'.
So Rosie said her first word today. I probably repeated it too much. Wanna know what it was?
@liamucifer honestly, I'm more jealous on Kermitt than you. And I bought that toy.
@Lilythiell should be with JOHN.
Interesting things in the OXFORD DICTIONARY. https://t.co/lSnlSajz4d
@sierrracheng @Bibisjulians I tend to do that.
@Bibisjulians there's not enough place for both me and his massive ego.
@xSofiaTMx for stating the current weather in England?
Nevermind. It started raining.
@discohijacks I had maybe hoped you unfollowed, like you said you would.
Hmm, never knew people were so sensitive about the weather.. I guess I'll avoid the subject in the future.
I hear it's kinda cloudy in Amsterdam, though.
Is it just me, or did London suddenly become sunnier?
@SergeiGoncharo6 because I am British...
@A_E_Black I'm pretty sure you can be Turkish, as well.
@StepanianGaiane I am, that's why it's so good. Obviously.
I take my words back. If it's made the right way, tea can turn a shitty morning into an acceptable one.
@leslyeknope most baby supplies are there.
@tjlcandtea I'm re-reading my favourite bits.
Well, finally put lovely daughter in bed & I can finish my book. https://t.co/Zt5iziClUD
@benedickcums Great. Almost finished my book.
@feathered_Angel @ContactSH there is nothing to forgive, since there have been no apologies.
@khenry1970 @ContactSH when you have to deal with a child you learn to use their methods.
@ContactSH that's it. See you tomorrow.
@ssherlockwatson no, but I love listening to it.
@PansBoobies I'm not. I am flattered, though.
@liamucifer @trimolyy @ContactSH good luck with that.
@_damn_sherlock_ oh, you can stop worrying. I haven't left Baker Street.
@kalewinslet @JohnsNotHisDate I meant tweeting about it.
@JohnsNotHisDate it was a desperate moment. Not one that I'm proud of.
I honestly can't understand how you can destroy the notion of privacy with a few tweets, but are too much of a... to apologize in public.
@difafeb that is the last thing I worry about.
Now, I'll get back to attending my lovely daughter. The only human being who makes any sense in 221B.
Tea does not, in fact, make everything better, by the way.
ðŸ™„ðŸ™„ðŸ™„ðŸ™„here we go againðŸ™„ðŸ™„ðŸ™„ðŸ™„
@gabirotta24 I have nothing to say to him at this moment.
@ContactSH you could, I don't know, do something really crazy and out of character and apologize.
@Mrweirdfrank because I'm not, in fact, gay.
@heyitslia_98 ... to sum up, he likes it.
